Individual action is routed through existing campus rules, with police informed where criminal offences are indicated.

The MLA allegedly threatened her husband when she refused his demands.

title: 4-lane MMR bridge near Mumbai suddenly narrows to 2; MMRDA denies design flaw
description: The recent construction of a Mira-Bhayander flyover is stirring controversy among local residents, who are voicing their frustrations over the unexpected reduction from four lanes to two. Many commuters are worried this change will exacerbate traffic congestion.

title: Carlos Alcaraz’s player box moment with DJ Peggy Gou turns heads
description: Carlos Alcaraz beat Alex de Minaur in straight sets at the 2026 Australian Open as DJ Peggy Gou watched from his player box. Days after their Seoul dinner, her presence caught attention in Melbourne. Alcaraz confirmed their friendship and said he hopes to reach the final to watch her perform at AO Live.

title: Inside the Chamba tragedy that left a pitbull guarding 2 bodies in snow for 4 days
description: A loyal pitbull named Jonu stood guard for four days over his deceased young owners, Viksit and Piyush, who tragically froze to death in Himachal's Chamba district. Rescuers found the brave dog refusing to leave their side. The cousins, aspiring vloggers, ventured into treacherous snow-laden mountains for content, leading to their fatal trek.

title: Boycott families if kids opt for love marriage: MP village panchayat
OpenAI VP Matt Knight resigns; shares 'note' sent to the company on Twitter; CEO Sam Altman replies
description: OpenAI's Chief Information Security Officer, Matt Knight, has resigned after over five years, having joined as the company's first security hire in 2020. Knight oversaw the development of OpenAI's security program, which now protects a global platform used by millions. He also led security product development, including the launch of Aardvark, before his departure.
